name: Double Dream
description: The sativa-dominant hybrid Double Dream puts a unique spin on the famed Blue Dream by crossing it with Dream Star. With a complex flavor profile that synchronizes sweet floral notes with berries and spice, Double Dream is a soothing and mentally invigorating strain that still allows clear-headed functionality. Its dreamy, euphoric buzz is anchored by a deep, physical relaxation that mutes pain, anxiety, stress, and inflammation. Patients also turn to this uplifting strain for daytime release from PTSD, headaches, and nausea.
descriptionPlain: The sativa-dominant hybrid Double Dream puts a unique spin on the famed Blue Dream by crossing it with Dream Star. With a complex flavor profile that synchronizes sweet floral notes with berries and spice, Double Dream is a soothing and mentally invigorating strain that still allows clear-headed functionality. Its dreamy, euphoric buzz is anchored by a deep, physical relaxation that mutes pain, anxiety, stress, and inflammation. Patients also turn to this uplifting strain for daytime release from PTSD, headaches, and nausea.

articles.title: Which Cannabis Strain Pairs Best With Your Zodiac Sign?
articles.author: Lisa Rough
articles.text:
Some people take astrology more seriously than others, but regardless of your level of obsession with all things zodiac, you at least know your star sign. That said, have you ever wondered which cannabis strain best reflects your astrological sign? We were curious so we took it upon ourselves to pair up the best strains that complement each personality type based on their horoscope sign.
Whether you‚Äôre as stubborn as a ram, as dramatic as a lion, or as balanced as a scale, we‚Äôve got a strain for you! So sit back, relax, and watch your stars and strains align.
Aries

Dates: 
March 21 ‚Äì April 19
Characteristics: 
Enthusiastic, Energetic, Independent
Cannabis Strain: 

This sativa-dominant strain will quell any unpleasant feelings with a soothing euphoric boost. Double Dream also offers relaxation with a creative focus and uplifting haziness to let you concentrate on the task at hand, awash in a warm wave of euphoria.
Taurus

Dates: 
April 20 ‚Äì May 20
Characteristics: 
Practical, Loyal, Dependable
Strain:

This sativa-dominant hybrid will uplift your spirit and instill a magical sense of euphoria. Your body will be buzzing and you‚Äôll be tickled Orange Haze with laughter. Resistance is futile, Taurus, so don‚Äôt resist the joy and energy of this sweet citrus strain.
Gemini

Dates: 
May 21 ‚Äì June 20
Characteristics: 
Energetic, Imaginative, Witty
Strain:

One of the great and illustrious beginnings for cannabis comes in the form of Haze, a California sativa that will lift you up with focus and creativity, but will also soothe any restlessness with a happy, imaginative buzz that will leave you spinning webs of inspiration.
Cancer

Dates: 
June 21 ‚Äì July 22
Characteristics:
Tenacious, Adaptable, Loyal
Strain:

This strain favorite will be your new best friend. A hybrid blend, GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) (and its many descendants) are sure to put a smile on your face and bring you peace and relaxation. This is the strain you‚Äôll want for when you‚Äôre looking to laugh until you giggle-snort (and then laugh some more).
Leo

Dates: 
July 23 ‚Äì August 22
Characteristics: 
Confident, Dramatic, Enthusiastic
Strain:

Admittedly, you‚Äôre a drama queen, but this strain is guaranteed to lessen the drama and up the ante with joy. Your verbal skills fall dormant and allow someone else to take the spotlight for a change, while you will find yourself quietly in awe at the beauty of the world. Pineapple Express is a freight train that runs on euphoria ‚Äì all aboard!
Virgo

Dates: 
August 23 ‚Äì September 22
Characteristics: 
Analytical, Observant, Loyal
Strain:

For the quietly observant Virgo, Space Queen is a hybrid that will help you out of your shell and make you feel relaxed and comfortable. This is a particularly good choice for those with social anxiety, as it‚Äôs a highly fun, sociable strain that elicits easy conversation.
Libra

Dates: 
September 23 ‚Äì October 22
Characteristics: 
Peaceful, Kind, Idealistic
Strain:

For the peaceful Libra, nothing suits you better than a high-CBD strain. This sativa-dominant option offers a clear-headed focus that will allow you to get your tasks done with a warm smile on your face. Harlequin is also a wonderful meditation aid, offering relaxation without sedation. Namaste!
Scorpio

Dates: 
October 23 ‚Äì November 21
Characteristics: 
Passionate, Intense, Observant
Strain:

This hybrid is chock full of euphoric happiness. Lemon Skunk also tends to dissipate stress and allow your mind to wander freely through a mellow field of lemony goodness. This strain works whether you‚Äôre feeling sociable or flying solo, and you may find yourself feeling some verbose inspiration.
Sagittarius

Dates: 
November 22 ‚Äì December 21
Characteristics: 
Adventurous, Independent, Conversational
Strain:

Alien Asshat is as fantastic and ridiculous as it sounds. A perfect match for your adventurous soul, this strain rocks a super high THC content that will blow you out of this world and gear you up for a cosmic journey through space and time (or maybe just an epic hike).
Capricorn

Dates: 
December 22 ‚Äì January 19
Characteristics: 
Resourceful, Organized, Disciplined
Strain:

Mother‚Äôs Helper is perfect for your inner coordinator as it swirls creativity through your mind. Your organizational urges will be appeased with a supremely satisfying sativa burst of energy, followed by a happy mellow cool-down as you survey your accomplishments with pride.
Aquarius

Dates:
January 20 ‚Äì February 18
Characteristics: 
Witty, Clever, Inventive
Strain: 

Blue Diamond will help you exercise your funny bone, with happy giggles and witty repartee galore. You‚Äôll be the life of the party, albeit from the luxurious comfort of a reclined position on a comfy couch. You get the best of both worlds with a soothing dose of pain relief to boot.
Pisces

Dates:
February 9 ‚Äì March 20
Characteristics: 
Compassionate, Imaginative, Escapist
Strain:

This strain is one of the best for bonding with friends. Pure Power Plant offers a warm, clear-headed euphoria that‚Äôs both uplifting and relaxing. Any leftover stress from your day will dissolve into psychedelic giggles and get you grooving to the music. Keep your eye drops handy, though ‚Äì red eyes abound!

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Enigma, Juliet, White Fire Alien OG, Double Dream, and Earth OG
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Say hello to the five new strains added to the Leafly database! Our new indica Enigma is a potent remedy for patients treating appetite loss or sleeplessness, and relief arrives quickly with relaxing euphoria. Popular in Colorado, Juliet is a sativa-dominant hybrid that delivers a subtle jolt of cerebral energy suitable for focus, creativity, and social outings. You can‚Äôt go wrong with Double Dream if you‚Äôre looking for something reminiscent of Blue Dream, and you‚Äôll recognize a few other familiar strains in the 60% indica White Fire Alien OG. Last but not least, Earth OG unites Sour Diesel and Ghost OG in an uplifting, happy hybrid that helps fend off depression, anxiety, and other mood disorders.
These strains aren‚Äôt complete without your reviews, so if you‚Äôve chanced upon any of these in your cannabis journeys, let‚Äôs hear your opinion!
1. Enigma
Characteristics of Enigma:

Indica-dominant strain
Earthy and tangy aroma
Brings long-lasting effects such as¬†euphoria, happiness, and sleepiness
Good for treating appetite loss and/or cachexia

2. Juliet
Characteristics of Juliet:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Cinderella 99 and NYC Diesel
Sweet berry aroma
Delivers a¬†buzz of cerebral energy¬†that promotes focus and sharpens the senses
May help with mood and stress disorders

3. White Fire Alien OG
Characteristics of White Fire Alien OG:

60% indica
Breeder: OG Raskal
Sweet lemon aroma
Cross between The White and Fire Alien Kush
Brings full-body relaxation and stress relief
Helps ease pain, anxiety, and tension

4. Double Dream
Characteristics of Double Dream:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Blue Dream and Dream Star
Sweet floral, berry and spice aroma
Delivers a dreamy, euphoric buzz anchored by a deep, physical relaxation¬†
May help treat¬†pain, anxiety, stress, inflammation, PTSD, headaches, and nausea

5. Earth OG
Characteristics of Earth OG:

Hybrid strain
Cross between Sour Diesel and Ghost OG
Earthy and sour lemon aroma
Can deliver¬†creative, energetic, and talkative¬†effects
Good for depression, stress, anxiety, appetite loss, and nausea
